comment: I like your grain additions. Interested in hearing how this turns out!
Yep, got this one on the board but so many ahead of it.  I've got 1554 and Cappuccino Stout | Lagunitas Brewing Company next :D  I need to help with drink it all.
I know what you mean! So much to brew, so little closet space ;-)

Merlin,  I did the two mentioned above and ESB next after the ABA.  :D  Look at the 1554 it turned out really good, I changed the recipe already to make it better. This could also be done as a proper lager.
